roomlist.name: Bottom of Driveway
roomlist.description: You are standing at the bottom of a driveway. There is a mid-sized ranch house to the north. The walls are made of brick with white sidings. There is a large front yard with some trees and bushes.

roomlist.name: Top of Driveway
roomlist.description: You are now directly in front of the house. The driveway is full of cracks and the house looks abandoned. There is a path to the backyard to the north, as well as a mailbox next to the front door. A basketball hoop is mounted on the house.

items.name: house
items.description: The house has brick walls with white sidings. The plants are thriving and the windows clean, but there is no sign of anyone living here.

items.name: basketball
items.description: It is round and orange with bumps all over.
items.room_description_addition: A basketball sits dejectedly on the side of the driveway.

items.name: house
items.description: Even up close, the house looks pristine.
